General.Name: KORE Group Holdings Inc
General.Description: KORE Group Holdings, Inc. provides Internet of Things (IoT) services and solutions worldwide. The company offers connectivity and location-based services, device solutions, and managed and professional services that are used in the development and support of IoT technology for the business market. Its products include IoT connectivity-as-a-service; connectivity enablement-as-a-service; device management services; and security software services. The company serves customers in healthcare, fleet and vehicle management, asset management, communication services, and industrial/manufacturing sectors. KORE Group Holdings, Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia.
General.Address: 3 Ravinia Drive, Atlanta, GA, United States, 30346
